welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Medina, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our beautiful streets, immerse yourself in our culture, and enjoy all that Medina has to offer."

restaurants.name: Panaderia El Deleite J&M
restaurants.description: Panaderia El Deleite J&M is a bakery located in Medina.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Jaryes
restaurants.description: Restaurante Jaryes is a restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport is the largest and busiest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is a smaller terminal, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wayne County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Wayne County Airport provides customs and immigration services for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves as a hub for regional airlines and offers a comfortable waiting area for passengers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Akron/canton Regional Airport is primarily used for international flights and provides a range of dining and shopping options for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
